title: Bruisyard Halloween Monster Mash Ball
text:
Bruisyard Halloween Monster Mash Ball Bruisyard Halloween Monster Mash Ball Details Category: Venues & Events Created   11:30 Get your ghoul on at Bruisyard Hall’s Annual Ball which is Halloween themed this October. On All Hallows' Eve 31st October, the barn will be transformed into a bubbling cauldron of fun and frolics, so find a skeleton in the closet and dance the night away. Party with ghost, ghouls and goblins at this incredible location deep in the dark Suffolk Countryside. Dating back to 1354, Bruisyard Hall and Barn was formally an abbey for the Poor Clare Nun's until 1539 when Henry VIII dissolved all the abbeys and monasteries. 
The resplendent barn will play host to Bruisyard's event of the year! Fancy dress is a must for all party goers to this spooky spectacular, so get creative. Whether ghoulish, terrifying or spine chilling is your thing, get into the Halloween spirit. The evening will begin at 7pm for arrival drinks and continue on until 1am when broomsticks and carriages must depart. Tickets for the event are £80 per person and include an arrival cocktail of Witches Brew, 3 course evening meal with coffee and all the fun, dancing and mayhem of the Monster Mash Ball. After dinner take part in the Halloween fun and games! The evening entertainment will combine fun, food, music, dancing and an endless stream of treats and tricks. There will also be a Silent and On The Night Auction with a fabulous array of items. All proceeds from these auctions will be donated to to EACH - East Anglian Children's Hospice Get a ghostly crew together and prepare the scariest dance moves for this frightfully fantastic evening. Bruisyard Hall offers tickets to The Monster Mash Ball for £80 per person including Arrival cocktail, party and 3 course evening meal with coffee. Related articles
